name: Shining Trails
description:
2056, Qya working class neighborhood:
Our protagonist Lydia, continues with the legacy that her father left her, a detective agency.

The Qya neighborhood has remained on the fringes of the city, despite being a capitalist world, the neighborhoods that could not adapt to robotic modernization, were abandoned by corporations, where the majority of economic activity in the area is an underground economy .

Most of the population does not dare to enter these types of neighborhoods, some of them, isolated from other cities, tend to be dangerous, having to ask for a special permit to visit them, thus accepting the consequences of visiting such neighborhoods.
For now Lydia, our protagonist, will have to keep the agency afloat ...

Could you continue the legacy?

If you like business simulators and economy management, try our game, you will surely love it!
